item.title: The Interaction of Tarots
item.description: This is my submission for Electronic Rituals, Oracles and Fortune Telling Meditation #2, in which we are to: Invent your own “oracle deck.” Keeping in mind the formal characteristics of cleromancy…, consider how digital media can complicate/diminish/augment the parts and processes of a reading. Concept My original idea for an electronic “oracle deck” would be a tarot reader that explores the interaction between cards using concepts from The Interaction of Color by Josef Albers.
